
{{alias}}( x )
    Returns an ndarray where the order of elements of an input ndarray is
    reversed along each dimension.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: ndarray
        Input array.

    Returns
    -------
    out: ndarray
        Output array.

    Examples
    --------
    // Define ndarray data and meta data...
    > var xbuf = new {{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}( [ 1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0 ] );
    > var dtype = 'float64';
    > var shape = [ 2, 2 ];
    > var sx = [ 2, 1 ];
    > var ox = 0;
    > var order = 'row-major';

    // Using ndarrays...
    > var x = {{alias:@stdlib/ndarray/ctor}}( dtype, xbuf, shape, sx, ox, order );
    > var y = {{alias}}( x );
    > y.data
    <Float64Array>[ 4.0, 3.0, 2.0, 1.0 ]

    See Also
    --------
